Warning.ConsumeCostUnavailable: {name} does not have {number} action points available.
Warning.ConsumeOutOfCombat: {name} cannot consume action points when out of combat.
Warning.NoActivities: This item has no activities configured.
Warning.NoAmmo: You have none remaining of the selected ammunition.
Warning.NoEffects: This activity has no effects configured.
Warning.NoElixir: The elixir with id '{id}' did not exist!
Warning.NoElixirUses: The {name} elixir has no uses left.
Warning.NoPool: The actor does not have enough points remaining in their {pool} pool.
Warning.NoRemainingUses: This item has no remaining uses.
Warning.NoTemplates: This item cannot create measured templates!
Warning.NoToken: A token must be present on the scene.

value.hint: The action point cost to make use of this activity.
value.label: Action Cost

count.hint: How many targets this activity can have, or areas of effect this activity creates.
count.label: Count

duration.hint: When measured templates created by this activity are automatically removed.
duration.label: Duration

range.hint: The maximum range between the character and the target.
range.label: Range

size.hint: The length or radius of the created template.
size.label: Size

type.hint: The type of targeting this activity requires, either individual targets or areas of effect.
type.label: Type

width.hint: The width of the created templates.
width.label: Width

ids.hint: The transferrable effects this activity will be able to transfer to a target.

distance.hint: The distance the target is teleported.
distance.label: Distance

attack.label: Attack
attack.hint: Select the basic attack this character uses. The damage dice and type will be inferred.

type.label: Type
type.hint: The damage type of the basic attack can be inferred from the attack or overridden.

max.hint: The size of this monster's danger pool.
max.label: Pool Maximum

spent.hint: How much of the danger pool has been spent.
spent.label: Spent

value.hint: The danger level of a monster determines their overall challenge as well as their action points.
value.label: Danger Level

armor.hint: Armor value reduces incoming physical damage.
armor.label: Armor

turn.hint: The number of additional action points this actor receives for each turn it takes in a combat round.
turn.label: Turn Bonus

value.hint: The number of action points this actor has remaining to spend on actions during combat.
value.label: Action Points

name.label: Shop
name.hint: The name of the shop. If left blank, the shop will use the merchant's name.

bonus.label: Agility Bonus
bonus.hint: A bonus to Agility guarantees this number of successes.

number.label: Agility Dice
number.hint: When making an Agility skill roll, this is the number of dice contributed by this skill.

bonus.label: Brawn Bonus
bonus.hint: A bonus to Brawn guarantees this number of successes.

number.label: Brawn Dice
number.hint: When making an Agility skill roll, this is the number of dice contributed by this skill.

bonus.label: Mind Bonus
bonus.hint: A bonus to Mind guarantees this number of successes.

number.label: Mind Dice
number.hint: When making an Mind skill roll, this is the number of dice contributed by this skill.

bonus.label: Spirit Bonus
bonus.hint: A bonus to Spirit guarantees this number of successes.

number.label: Spirit Dice
number.hint: When making an Spirit skill roll, this is the number of dice contributed by this skill.

points.label: Point Requirement
points.hint: The number of points required to unlock this advancement.

bleeding.label: Bleeding
bleeding.effect: {actor} takes {level}d6 physical damage at the start of every round.

burning.label: Burning
burning.effect: {actor} takes {level}d12 fire damage at the start of every round.

number.label: Number
number.hint: The number of dice rolled by this damage part.

damageTypes.label: Damage Types
damageTypes.hint: The damage types available for this damage part. Having more than one will offer a choice.

expiration.hint: Select when this effect automatically expires.
expiration.label: Expiration

granted.hint: Whether this buff is currently granted.
granted.label: Granted

itemData.hint: Stored item data for the item that was destroyed when fusing onto this.
itemData.label: Item Data

level.hint: The current level of this status condition.
level.label: Level

primary.hint: The primary status condition of this effect.
primary.label: Primary Status

source.hint: The uuid of the item that granted this buff.
source.label: Source

subtype.hint: An actor or item type used to determine the available options on the sheet of this effect.
subtype.label: Subtype

subtype.hint: The type of armor this is will determine how it is equipped.
subtype.label: Armor Type

WARNING.invalidPath: The dropped Path item does not have a valid identifier!

identifier.label: Path Identifier
identifier.hint: Which of the core paths this item represents.
identifier.hintMixed: Which of the mixed paths this item represents.

levels.hint: How many levels of given conditions this item applies when dealing damage.
levels.label: Applied Levels

boost.hint: When using this elixir to boost a roll, this is the type of pool it can enhance.
boost.label: Boost

ignore.hint: If checked, an item property will not be added via fusions by default when this item is fused onto another.
ignore.label: Ignored Properties

max.hint: The maximum number of fusions that can target this item at the same time.
max.label: Maximum Fusions

value.hint: The deemed value of the item.
value.label: Price

value.hint: The size of this stack of items.
value.label: Quantity

max.hint: The total number of uses of this item.
max.label: Max Uses

spent.hint: The number of uses of this item that have been spent.
spent.label: Spent

value.hint: The amount that this item contributes to its owner's encumbrance.
value.label: Weight

PATH_CONFIGURATION.investHint: Invest additional points into your current paths.
PATH_CONFIGURATION.title: Improve Paths: {name}

PURCHASE.summary: The members of {name} spent {total} at {shop} on the following items:

HEALTH.content: You must have at least {value} health remaining.

LEVEL.content: You must have invested at least {value} points in your paths.

POOL.content: Your {pool} pool must contain at least {value} dice.

SKILL.content: Your {skill} skill must be at least of size {value}.

doors.hint: Enter the uuid of the doors whose state is changed by this behavior.
doors.label: Doors

once.hint: Disable this behavior once it has been triggered.
once.label: Once

state.hint: The new state the doors will be set to.
state.label: State

merchant.hint: When a token moves into this region, all non-GM users who are owners of the token will render this merchant's sheet.
merchant.label: Merchant

decrease.hint: Rather than granting or increasing the level of a condition, this behavior will remove or decrease the level.
decrease.label: Remove

status.hint: The condition that will be applied or increased within this region.
status.label: Status

Defend.PoolHint: Expend points from the relevant pool to increase the number of dice rolled.
Defend.Title: {name}: Defensive Roll

Pool.AmountHint: The number of dice to roll.
Pool.Title: Roll Pool: {type}

Warning.NotEnoughPoolDice: {name} does not have enough {type} dice to roll.

ERROR.NotYourTurn: You cannot move when it is not your turn.
ERROR.NotEnoughAP: This movement would require at least {cost} Action Points.

ROLL_DIALOG.TITLE: Roll Skills: {name}
ROLL_DIALOG.hint: Select two skills to combine for the roll, adding together their dice and bonuses.

ActivityUseDialog.ConsumeActionHint: When in combat, this action requires consuming {points} action points.
ActivityUseDialog.ConsumeUsesHint: Consume a use of this elixir.
ActivityUseDialog.DefendHint: Each point spent from the pool will add one additional die to the roll.
ActivityUseDialog.ElixirsHint: Elixirs can be consumed for additional points to spend.
ActivityUseDialog.HealingHint: Each point spent from the pool will add one additional die to the healing.
ActivityUseDialog.TeleportHint: Each point spent from the pool will increase the range of the teleportation by 1m.
ActivityUseDialog.TemplateHint: Each point spent from the pool will increase the distance or radius of the area of effect by 1m.
ActivityUseDialog.Title: Use Activity: {name}

Warning.Overspending: You do not have enough available resources to enhance the activity in this way.

DefenseDialog.Content: {name} is about to take {damage} damage. You can attempt to parry or block to reduce the damage by an amount equal to the rolled totals.
DefenseDialog.ItemsHint: Choose any of your equipped arsenal to defend against the attack and reduce incoming damage.
DefenseDialog.Title: Defense Roll: {name}

EquipDialog.Hint: Select the item to equip in this slot.
EquipDialog.Label: Item
EquipDialog.Title: Change Equipped Item
EquipDialog.Warning: You have no items that can be equipped in that slot.

ItemFusionDialog.SplitHint: Select the active fusion to split off this item. The source item will be restored.
ItemFusionDialog.Title: {source}: Fuse

LootDialog.Content: Grant the loot from this monster ({name}) to the primary party? The loot will be removed from the monster.
LootDialog.Title: {name}: Grant Loot

amount.hintCurrency: The amount of funds to distribute. Each recipient will receive this amount.
amount.hintPoints: The amount of points to distribute. Each recipient will receive this amount.
amount.label: Amount

targets.hint: The members of this party that will receive part of the distribution.

PartyFundsDialog.hint: The amount to deposit or subtract from the party funds.
PartyFundsDialog.InsufficientMemberFunds: The member does not have enough funds available to deposit.
PartyFundsDialog.InsufficientPartyFunds: The party does not have enough funds available to withdraw.
PartyFundsDialog.label: Amount
PartyFundsDialog.Title: Manage Funds: {name}

actorId.hint: Select the member of the party that will receive the item.
actorId.label: Target

quantity.hint: Select the quantity of the item to trade to the target.
quantity.label: Quantity

Warning.NoParty: An item cannot be traded with no primary party assigned.
Warning.NoQuantity: You cannot trade an item from an empty stack.

Warning.InvalidActiveEffectType: The chosen effect type is not valid for this parent.
Warning.MissingActionPoints: You do not have enough Action Points to perform that action.
